Judul: THE EFFECT OF ADVERTISING ON CORPORATE SOCIAL RESPONSIBILITY TOWARDS CONSUMERS INTENTION TO BUY
Abstrak: In business world, marketing strategy is one of the most important factors and by the running of time it always develop and adapt. Advertising of corporate social responsibility program is a part of value based marketing strategy which categorized as new strategy to be implemented in Indonesia. The main purpose of this strategy is achieve sustainable profitability company.
Kata Kunci: Value based marketing, advertising of corporate social responsibility, intention to buy.
